channel.title: goals on Just Enough Craig
channel.description: Recent content in goals on Just Enough Craig

item.title: A few goals for the year 2021
item.description: Don’t get COVID-19. I’ve made it this far, and the vaccine is so close that this goal is a no-brainer—​even though as a middle-aged, nonessential, stay-at-home person I’ll be last in line for the vaccine. Kill the grass in my front yard. I don’t see the point in having front-yard grass in Arizona. But I dislike rock yards, too, so it’s unclear what final form the yard will take when the grass is gone.
